titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: SERVICE AND COST EXCLUSION TOTAL COST (PATIENT LEVEL INFORMATION COSTING) - Description

div.p: SERVICE AND COST EXCLUSION TOTAL COST (PATIENT LEVEL INFORMATION COSTING) is the same as attribute FINANCIAL AMOUNT for the purpose of reporting Patient Level Information Costing.

SERVICE AND COST EXCLUSION TOTAL COST (PATIENT LEVEL INFORMATION COSTING) is the total cost, on a full absorption basis, of PATIENT facing and support costs for all resources and ACTIVITIES reported in the SERVICE and cost exclusion in the Patient Level Information Costing System Acute Data Sets.
